about_the_game:
Experience stunning visuals to complement the realism and accuracy that you have come to expect from the General Aviation aircraft experts at Alabeo. The C400 Corvalis TT has been designed to further push the limits of what can be achieved and delivers super high quality detail to satisfy even the most demanding private pilot’s needs.


  • Six HD liveries and one blank HD livery for repainting
  • Alabeo G1000 units
  • Superb material shines and reflections
  • Volumetric side view propeller effect
  • Gauges reflections
  • Knob click sounds
  • Windows scratches and blades shine
  • High quality 3D model and textures
  • Realistic flying behaviour
detailed_description:
Experience stunning visuals to complement the realism and accuracy that you have come to expect from the General Aviation aircraft experts at Alabeo. The C400 Corvalis TT has been designed to further push the limits of what can be achieved and delivers super high quality detail to satisfy even the most demanding private pilot’s needs.


  • Six HD liveries and one blank HD livery for repainting

  • Superb material shines and reflections
  • Volumetric side view propeller effect
  • Gauges reflections
  • Knob click sounds

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® XP Service Pack 2 or later
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz or higher (single core)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX®9 compliant video card or greater, 256 MB video RAM or higher, Shader Model 1.1 or higher (Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible.
  • Additional Notes: Broadband internet connection required for multiplayer features.

short_description: The C400 Corvalis TT has been designed to further push the limits of what can be achieved and delivers super high quality detail to satisfy even the most demanding private pilot’s needs.
